actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To conduct a study regarding the improvement of pier safety standards in navigable waters.
short_title: Monica Kristina Rodriguez Pier Safety Study

summary.text: Monica Kristina Rodriguez Pier Safety Study - Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a study to improve pier safety standards in navigable waters. Requires the Secretary to submit a report on the study's findings to appropriate Congressional committees.

titles.title: Monica Kristina Rodriguez Pier Safety Study
To conduct a study regarding the improvement of pier safety standards in navigable waters.
